name: Baby Ninja vs zombies - Best shoot and chop flying action for boys
name_original: Baby Ninja vs zombies - Best shoot and chop flying action for boys
description:
NOW WITH ALL-NEW NINJAS AND KICK ASS ZOMBIES YOU CAN SHOOT, CHOP AND KILL JUST FOR FUN

Play as the heroic baby ninja and defend your village against hordes of attacking zombies! Run as far as you can and use your special ninja power to jump above or shoot deadly ninja stars!

STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY
Jumo or Shoot it is you call, make it count!

CHOOSE YOUR NINJA
Baby boy, Baby girl or a NINJA DOG

ENDLESS FUN
Play to earn coins. Get coins by killing Dragon Plants, Zombies, Death man and iron tombstones.

UPGRADE YOUR NINJA
Use you coins to but new charectors

Baby ninja vs Zombies is the best run, shoot and chop kick-ass action game around

FREE to play!
